itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Fleece.

item.name: Fleece
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Lynch Ranch.

item.name: Needle Trinket of Temptation
item.desc: The energy of Temptation is contained within this Needle Trinket.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Needle Trinket of Temptation, Needle Trinket

item.name: Needle Trinket of Destruction
item.desc: The energy of Destruction is contained within this Needle Trinket.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Needle Trinket of Destruction, Needle Trinket

item.name: Needle Trinket of Crimson Flame
item.desc: The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Needle Trinket.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Needle Trinket of Crimson Flame, Needle Trinket

item.name: Ultimate Needle Trinket
item.desc: A Needle Trinket developed to its maximum potential.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Needle Trinket of Crimson Flame, Needle Trinket of Destruction, Needle Trinket of Temptation, Needle Trinket

item.name: Needle Trinket
item.desc: A trinket with a pouch full of needles.

item.name: Wool
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Knitting Yarn. It requires the knowledge of Grinding: Beginner.

※ Find Ornella in Heidel and complete the Materials for Equipment Repair Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Blue Sheep Hide Cushion
item.desc: A blue cushion made of Sheep Hide.

item.name: Red Sheep Hide Cushion
item.desc: A red cushion made of Sheep Hide.

item.name: Calpheon Artisanal Carpet
item.desc: A carpet made by master craftsman in Calpheon.

item.name: Mediah Patterned Tapestry
item.desc: A tapestry with a Mediahn pattern.

item.name: Glamorous Patterned Tapestry
item.desc: A tapestry with a fancy pattern.

item.name: Multi-Patterned Carpet
item.desc: A carpet with a fancy design.
